We should abandon all class
distinctions and just obtain
series of numbers. This would
eliminate the need to learn
names, streets, cities, states or
even kinds of food or products.


We could learn in a particular
numbered slot and take our tests
and pass to the next higher step
without ever knowing our names,
the teachers names or even the
authors of the books.

are receiving monthly benefits.
The average benefit paid to
widowed mother with two children
is nearly 500 monthly.

cuss with your husband, wife or
friend--which group should you
